net.conquiris.schema

Interface SchemaItem

  • All Superinterfaces:
    FieldNameProperty, IsIndexedFlag, IsStoredFlag
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BinarySchemaItem, BooleanSchemaItem, ByteStringSchemaItem, DoubleSchemaItem, FloatSchemaItem, InstantSchemaItem, IntegerSchemaItem, LongSchemaItem, NumericSchemaItem<T>, StreamSchemaItem, TextSchemaItem, UUIDSchemaItem

    public interface SchemaItem
extends FieldNameProperty, IsStoredFlag, IsIndexedFlag
    Conquiris Lucene document schema item base interface. Schema items MUST be immutable.
    Author:
    Andres Rodriguez

    • Field Summary

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getMaxOccurs()
      Returns the maximum number of occurrences.
      int getMinOccurs()
      Returns the minimum number of occurrences.
      boolean isRequired()
      Whether the field is required, ie, the minimum number of occurrences is greater than zero.
